titleStmt.title: A necessarie admonition out of the prophet Joël concerning that hand of God that of late was upon us, and is not clean taken of as yet: and othervvise also verie fitlie agreeing (in divers good points) unto these dayes wherein wee live. By Edm. Bunny.
titleStmt.author: Bunny, Edmund, 1540-1619.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Robinson, for Thomas Man, and Thomas Gubbins,

notesStmt.note: Even page numbers on recto following p. 48.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace, London, England.
